        TaskInstance createTaskInstance(Long taskId,
                                String masterRequestId,
                                Long procInstId,
                                String secOwner,

      • createTaskInstance

        TaskInstance createTaskInstance(Long taskId,
                                Long procInstId,
                                String secondaryOwner,
                                Long secondaryOwnerId,
                                String message,
                                String pOwnerAppName,
                                Long pAssTaskInstId,
                                String taskName,
                                int dueInSeconds,
                                Map<String,String> indices,
                                String assignee,
                                String masterRequestId)
                         throws TaskException,
                                DataAccessException
        Creates a task instance. This is the main version. There is another version for creating independent task instance directly from task manager, and a third version for creating detail-only task instances. The method does the following: - create task instance entry in database - create SLA if passed in or specified in template - create groups for new TEMPLATE based tasks - create indices for new TEMPLATE based general tasks - send notification if specified in template - invoke old-style observer if specified in template - auto-assign if specified in template - record in audit log
        Parameters:
        taskId - task template ID
        procInstId - process instance ID
        secondaryOwner - can be DOCUMENT (general task) or WORK_TRANSITION_INSTANCE (for classic task)
        secondaryOwnerId - document ID or transition instance ID
        message - return message (typically stacktrace for fallout tasks) of the activity for classic task
        ownerApp - owner system MAL, optionally followed by ":" and engine URL. The field is only populated when the task manager is remote
        assTaskInstId - when the task manager is remote and for summary only, this field is populated with the task instance ID of the local task manager
        taskName - task name. Taken from task template when not populated (for VCS assets is task template label)
        dueInSeconds - SLA. When it is 0, check if template has specified SLA
        indices - indices for general task based on templates
        assignee - assignee CUID if this is to be auto-assigned by process variable
        Returns:
        TaskInstance
        Throws:
        TaskException
        DataAccessException

      • createTaskInstance

        TaskInstance createTaskInstance(Long taskId,
                                String masterOwnerId,
                                String comment,
                                Date dueDate,
                                Long userId,
                                Long documentId)
                         throws TaskException,
                                DataAccessException
        This version is used by the task manager to create a task instance not associated with a process instance.
        Parameters:
        taskId -
        masterOwnerId -
        comment - optional
        dueDate - optional
        userId -
        documentId - secondary owner, optional
        Returns:
        TaskInstance
        Throws:
        TaskException
        DataAccessException

      • performActionOnTaskInstance

        TaskInstance performActionOnTaskInstance(String action,
                                         Long taskInstanceId,
                                         Long userId,
                                         Long assigneeId,
                                         String comment,
                                         String destination,
                                         boolean notifyEngine)
                                  throws TaskException,
                                         DataAccessException
        Throws:
        TaskException
        DataAccessException

      • performActionOnTaskInstance

        TaskInstance performActionOnTaskInstance(String action,
                                         Long taskInstanceId,
                                         Long userId,
                                         Long assigneeId,
                                         String comment,
                                         String destination,
                                         boolean notifyEngine,
                                         boolean allowResumeEndpoint)
                                  throws TaskException,
                                         DataAccessException
        Performs an action on a task instance. Updates the task instance to the appropriate status and state based on the action being performed.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be performed
        taskInstanceId - the task instance to act on
        userId - the user performing the action
        assignee - the assignee if the action is "claim" or "assignee"
        comment - comment to be associated with the task
        destination - the destination outcome selected for the action
        notifyEngine - when true, notify engine for task completion/cancellation
        allowResumeEndpoint - consults the service endpoint for resuming workflow (prevent infinite recursion when this is called from the service endpoint itself)
        Returns:
        the updated task instance
        Throws:
        TaskException
        DataAccessException
